// Core game types and interfaces
export let Direction=/*#__PURE__*/function(Direction){Direction["UP"]="UP";Direction["DOWN"]="DOWN";Direction["LEFT"]="LEFT";Direction["RIGHT"]="RIGHT";Direction["NONE"]="NONE";return Direction;}({});export let CellType=/*#__PURE__*/function(CellType){CellType[CellType["EMPTY"]=0]="EMPTY";CellType[CellType["WALL"]=1]="WALL";CellType[CellType["PELLET"]=2]="PELLET";CellType[CellType["POWER_PELLET"]=3]="POWER_PELLET";CellType[CellType["GHOST_HOUSE"]=4]="GHOST_HOUSE";CellType[CellType["TUNNEL"]=5]="TUNNEL";CellType[CellType["FRUIT"]=6]="FRUIT";return CellType;}({});export let GhostState=/*#__PURE__*/function(GhostState){GhostState["CHASE"]="CHASE";GhostState["SCATTER"]="SCATTER";GhostState["FRIGHTENED"]="FRIGHTENED";GhostState["EATEN"]="EATEN";GhostState["IN_HOUSE"]="IN_HOUSE";return GhostState;}({});export let GhostType=/*#__PURE__*/function(GhostType){GhostType["BLINKY"]="BLINKY";GhostType["PINKY"]="PINKY";GhostType["INKY"]="INKY";GhostType["CLYDE"]="CLYDE";return GhostType;}({});
